features.name: Difficulty Level System
features.description: Controlled by `BUGSTORE_DIFFICULTY` env var (0, 1, 2) Level 0: no filters, verbose errors, no rate limit, no WAF Level 1: basic char blacklist (`<`, `>`, `'`, `"`, `;` in some params), generic error messages, rate limit 100 req/min, partial headers (X-Frame-Options but no CSP) Level 2: WAF Caddy+Coraza active, strict CSP, rate limit 30 req/min, server+client validation, HSTS active Middleware that reads env var and applies corresponding filters All 3 levels maintain all 30 vulns — but increase exploitation difficulty
